tasks.title: Design Homepage UI
tasks.description: Create the initial design for the homepage, including the header, footer, and main content layout.

tasks.title: Develop API for User Authentication
tasks.description: Build the REST API for user login, registration, and JWT token management.

tasks.title: Write Documentation for Project Setup
tasks.description: Prepare the documentation to help new developers set up the project locally, including environment setup and dependencies.

tasks.title: Test Payment Integration
tasks.description: Ensure that the payment gateway is correctly integrated and functioning by performing manual and automated tests.

tasks.title: Set Up Continuous Integration Pipeline
tasks.description: Configure Jenkins or GitHub Actions to automate the build and deployment process.
